data.name: Fruit farmer
data.detailed_description:
A small town is asking you for help...You need to help them - by growing fruits!
Starting from a small farm with a few trees, you can develop your garden to a huge fruit plantation!

Grow trees -
Each crop plot needs to be prepared for planting, dug up, watered, fertilized and most importantly built!
Every tree needs constant care. Remove weeds, water and harvest!

Fruit -
By collecting fruits, you can sell them, make juice or puree out of them!
Every coin earned can be spent on improving the farm.

Open world -
A lot of puzzles that you have to solve will open the way to new types of fruits, trees and resources.

Supply and demand -
Every day the prices for everything you can sell change, you have to develop the right strategy for more profit!

Construction -
Create farm improvements. Build decorations! Create your own individual and beautiful piece of land!

Crafting and Resources -
Get resources in the open world, recycle them and craft!
All improvements and buildings require certain resources, you will have to try to get the best improvements.

Individual tasks -
You will often receive letters with tasks! Often they will be difficult... but the reward is always worth the effort! Decide for yourself!

data.short_description: Build your incredible farm! Create upgrades, get resources, create new types of fruits, sell what you have collected or create products from it! Explore an open world with lots of puzzles! Be the best farmer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 Core (Intel core i3, Ryzen 3)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 Gb VRAM (Gtx 970)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5, Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
